projects.title: COVID-19 Tracker
projects.description: This app was created with create-react-app and uses charts, axios and styled-components. Sources data from public API.

projects.title: The Network
projects.description: This is a project that simulates a social media app akin to Twitter/Facebook. It was built in the MERN+G stack, using MongoDB as the store, Express/Node as the middleware, React as the frontend and GraphQL to query the API.
